Description: Gold coin. Umayyad dinar in imitation of Byzantine solidus. (whole)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2018, 6 May- 30 June, National Museum, New Delhi, India and the World: A History in Nine Stories 2017-2018, 10 Nov 2017 - 18 Feb 2018, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya (CSMVS), Mumbai, India, India and the World: A History in Nine Stories 2015-2016 29 Oct–7 Feb, London, BM, G35, Egypt: faith after the pharaohs.
